text: Flint is an industry city in east central Michigan. The city of Flint is where General Motors was born. As of 2020, it is the 12th largest city in Michigan. In June 1953 a deadly tornado cut through the area, which killed more than 110 in the area. This is also where the Flint water crisis happened, where the water source was contaminated with lead. ==Other websites== Category:County seats in Michigan
title: Flint, Michigan
